pages.text: The Adjustable Lamp is a very useful block. You can adjust the brightness of the lamp in two ways: $(li)Right clicking will increase the brightness of the lamp by 1. $(li)Providing a redstone signal will lock the lamp at a brightness equal to the signal strength.

pages.title: More Details
pages.text: The lamp will also emit a comparator signal equal to it's brighness level.$(br)Due to limitations in Minecraft, lamps of brightness 14 and 15 output the same amount of light. Redstone functionality is still retained appropriately though.
